amendment.description: Amendment deletes language that placed limits on personnel compensation and travel for the Office of the Secretary of Veterans Affairs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 63 as printed in the Congressional Record of June 24, 1996, to strike provisions of the bill that limit to $3.2 million the amount that may be spent by the Secretary on staff salaries and benefits and which limit to $50,000 the amount that may be spent by the office on travel.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hefner amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
